DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study determine change perceive level pain dysfunction 50 patient chronic low back pain , follow use custom-made shoe orthotics three month period . The hypothesis study custom orthotic intervention improve patient ' low back pain dysfunction symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Orthotic Use Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males female must least 18 year old . 2 . Subjects must symptomatic current pain T12 Sacroiliac joint without radiate pain . 3 . Symptoms must present least three month . 1 . Use custommade shoe orthotics past year 2 . Brain disorder ( i.e . : dementia Alzheimer 's Disease ) would lead difficulty questionnaire completion . 3 . Active conservative care ( physical therapy chiropractic care ) low back receive last six month ( exclude use oral medication daily athome exercise general wellbeing ) . We want overtreat patient crossover effect within study previous treatment . 4 . Not fluent literate English language . We able provide multiple translator within pilot study . 5 . Current future litigation low back pain . 6 . Chronic pain low back pain fibromyalgia 7 . Low back surgery last six month . 8 . Other condition may affect outcome study exclude patient participation study , include contraindication orthotic use . 9 . Peripheral neuropathy due disorder diabetes . 10 . Low back leg pain reproducible .
